title: Nano silver oxide-modified activated carbon as a novel catalyst for efficient removal of bacteria and micropollutants in aquatic environment

Heterogeneous Fenton process is a promising water treatment technology for sterilization and degradation of organic pollutants, due to the strong oxidation of hydroxyl radicals (OH˙) generated.
